nutrients.source: UK SACN Reports (2011–2018), COMA reports, and Expert Group on Vitamins and Minerals (EVM)

1-150.note: SACN has not set specific water intake recommendations; general guidance aligns with EFSA (~2.0–2.5 L/day for adults).

19-150.note: UK CMO (2016): Limit alcohol intake to ≤14 units/week for both men and women.

1-150.note: SACN/COMA: No recommended intake or UL; advice is to keep intake as low as possible within a balanced diet.

19-150.note: EVM/EFSA: Safe intake for adults up to 400 mg/day (~4 cups of coffee).

14-50.note: UK NHS guidance: Pregnant women should limit caffeine intake to <200 mg/day.

1-150.note: SACN (2003, reaffirmed 2018): Adults should consume no more than 6 g/day of salt (~2400 mg sodium).
